abstract: Saudi Arabian Interior Ministry says 93 people have been arrested on terrorism charges since December 2014, including group suspected of plotting to strike United States embassy.
lead_paragraph: Some of the suspects were accused of plotting to strike the United States Embassy with a car bomb, the Saudi Interior Ministry said.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia Accuses 93 of Terrorist Links, Including to ISIS
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Saudi Arabia: 93 Terror Arrests

snippet: Some of the suspects were accused of plotting to strike the United States Embassy with a car bomb, the Saudi Interior Ministry said.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
